trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Marina Del Rey
There were no other sightings in Marina Del Rey on or around August 10th 2006
Summary: perfectly huge blue round object.. The blue hue was darker then the blue sky.
divs: sighting detailsi was driving s\e by marina del rey, ca. at approx 2 pm when i noticed a hugh blue round object floating s\w from behind a large cloud. at first i thought it was a weather balloon, but it was too large for a weather balloon. the object had no lights or windows or anything dangling under or around it. that object was so beautiful with it's blue hue and it's perfect circumference. i was 65 years old at that time and i never saw an object so large. it was traveling at a fast pace and was driving in the opposite direction and lost sight of it.
